metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In BIND 9.16.19, 9.17.16. Also, version 9.16.19-S1 of BIND SupportedPreview Edition When a vulnerable version of named receives a query underthe circumstances described above, the named process will terminate due toa failed assertion check. The vulnerability affects only BIND 9 releases9.16.19, 9.17.16, and release 9.16.19-S1 of the BIND Supported PreviewEdition.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
